column4: whats the command to list all my .mp3-files in /, in terminal?
append something like "> MyMP3" at the end of that, and you get all the output into a file called MyMP3. innit neat?
to any command. the > redirects the output of something into what you type after it
in linux, files and devices can be the same thing, etc, so sometimes there are incidents like that. its no problem
